sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FacturaService } from 'src/app/services/factura.service'; import { Factura } from '../domain/factura'; import { Cliente } from '../domain/cliente'; @Component({ selector: 'app-facturas', templateUrl: './facturas.component.html', styleUrls: ['./facturas.component.css'] }) export class FacturasComponent implements OnInit{ facturas: any factura: Factura = new Factura() constructor(private facturasServices: FacturaService){ } ngOnInit(): void { this.facturas = this.facturasServices.getFacturas() } guardar(){ this.facturasServices.saveFacturas(this.factura).subscribe(data => { console.log(data) if(data.codigo ==1) this.ngOnInit() else alert("Error al insertar "+ data.mensaje) this.ngOnInit() }) } }
